Welcome to Ojota's documentation!
=================================

Ojota is a ORM and flat file database engine.

Ojota if Free Software! you can check the code at http://bitbucket.org/msa_team/ojota

Supported data formats
=======================
 * JSON
 * YAML
 * JSON throw web service

Installation
============
With easy_install

.. code-block:: bash

    sudo easy_install ojota

With pip

.. code-block:: bash

    sudo pip install ojota

From source

.. code-block:: bash

    hg clone ssh://hg@bitbucket.org/msa_team/ojota
    sudo python setup.py install
